seo.title: Monterosso FAQ 2025 | Common Questions Answered
seo.description: Frequently asked questions about Monterosso al Mare. Beaches, parking, trains, and practical visitor info.

body.title: Frequently Asked Questions
body.subtitle: Everything you need to know before visiting Monterosso. Practical answers to common questions.

items.question: Is the beach free?
items.answer: Partly. There are free public areas and paid beach clubs (stabilimenti) with sunbeds, umbrellas, and service.

items.question: Where should I stay - Old Town or Fegina?
items.answer: Old Town for charm and historic atmosphere, Fegina for beach access and modern amenities. Both connected by tunnel.

items.question: Is there parking?
items.answer: Yes, at Loreto parking area (~â‚¬25/day). The village center is car-free. Shuttle bus runs to center.

items.question: How do I get to the other villages?
items.answer: Train every 20 minutes (4 min between villages). Get Cinque Terre Card for unlimited rides + hiking trails.

items.question: Can I swim in the sea?
items.answer: Absolutely! May to October is best. Water is clean and clear. Both sandy and rocky swimming spots.

items.question: Are there ATMs and shops?
items.answer: Yes, Monterosso has the best facilities of all five villages. ATMs, pharmacy, grocery stores, and more.
